Actually there is a very valid reason to bitch and complain about quality. back in 2001, when lord of the rings first hit the cinema, the quality was top notch, there were a few other films that came out in subsequent years that were top notch (in fact a good 80% of them) 

Seems that the pirate scene has actually gone down hill since 07 with movies getting progressively worse in quality. 

People can always shut up and accept it because of the age old argument that its free, but come on its now 2012 with HD camera's mounted on frigging mobile phones for fuck sake.

It also seems that people like to name their cam anyway they chose to draw the downloads and get the fabled green skull. 

TS is a telesync, yet ive seen it used for bad cam rips and advertised as TS as the ripper hasnt got a frigging clue. 

Ive seen DVD rip plastered about when its blatantly not.

and i think the worst offenders are those that say they are a screener when they are CAMS as well.

There used to be a time when you could tell what kind of quality you were getting with your download just by the title of the up. 

Now its full of wankers moaning about Q and V and some even seem to think that you really need to care about what they rate the movie at with the fabled M making an appearance. 

Maybe if people named their UP's with accurate descriptions, we wouldn't need to argue over the quality or constantly ask about it. back in the day the only real question to ask was "is it fake?"

May be im just getting old so know how it used to be, downloading films via news groups, getting rips of the latest films from people who actually cared about the quality of the work they did before releasing it. 

Now it just seems people want to get a crap quality copy out with out any respect to them selves or the work involved, hell if i could go to the cinema and put my balls on the line to get a recording of a new film, id sure as hell make sure that shit was as good as humanly and technologically possible before releasing the fucker, id want people to know that with my name on that shit they new they would be getting superior quality.

And on that bomb shell, i have just one more thing to add. TURN THE FUCKING AUTO FOCUS OFF, hell even my 4 year old knows how to do that.

as for keeping your finger on the mouse to keep things moving, should of been on the newsgroups to get your releases, keeping the movie playing was a simple case of getting the correct codex, if you couldn't figure that out even back then. well no hope for some people really.

i was getting bootleg films back when they were on VHS and the internet was still gathering pace. when 1.5meg of porn to fit on a floppy disk was awesome and 56k modems where the norm and it took a life time to download pretty much anything and a 486 dx2 66 was considered the bollocks in PC hardware.

just because the internet has made things easier to get things for your self, don't presume to know what other people did before broadband came along. boot legging movies has been around longer than the ability to download it from the internet.
